newsitem.title: USA: First Central unit not writing new business.
newsitem.headline: First Central unit not writing new business.

text.p: First Central Financial Corp said Monday it is developing a plan to restructure the operations of its insurance company subsidiary, First Central Insurance Co, and attract a substantial capital investment.
First Central said the insurance company subsidiary has determined not to write any new business until it has improved its operations and financial condition.
First Central said the subsidiary continues to process policy renewals and service its existing business.
